verses.text: And there shall come \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* a \w rod|strong="H2415"\w* out of the \w stem|strong="H1503"\w* of \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w*, and a \w Branch|strong="H5342"\w* shall \w grow|strong="H6509"\w* out of his \w roots|strong="H8328"\w*:

And the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall \w rest|strong="H5117"\w* upon him, the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* and \w understanding|strong="H0998"\w*, the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* and \w might|strong="H1369"\w*, the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w* and of the \w fear|strong="H3374"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*;

And shall make him of quick \w understanding|strong="H7306"\w* in the \w fear|strong="H3374"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: and he shall not \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* after the \w sight|strong="H4758"\w* of his \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, neither \w reprove|strong="H3198"\w* after the \w hearing|strong="H4926"\w* of his \w ears|strong="H0241"\w*:\f + \fr 11.3 \ft quick…: Heb. scent or, smell\f*

But with \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w* shall he \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* the \w poor|strong="H1800"\w*, and \w reprove|strong="H3198"\w* with \w equity|strong="H4334"\w* for the \w meek|strong="H6035"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: and he shall \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* with the \w rod|strong="H7626"\w* of his \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, and with the \w breath|strong="H7307"\w* of his \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* shall he \w slay|strong="H4191"\w* the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*.\f + \fr 11.4 \ft reprove: or, argue\f*

And \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w* shall be the \w girdle|strong="H0232"\w* of his \w loins|strong="H4975"\w*, and \w faithfulness|strong="H0530"\w* the \w girdle|strong="H0232"\w* of his \w reins|strong="H2504"\w*.

The \w wolf|strong="H2061"\w* also shall \w dwell|strong="H1481"\w* with the \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w*, and the \w leopard|strong="H5246"\w* shall lie \w down|strong="H7257"\w* with the \w kid|strong="H1423"\w*; and the \w calf|strong="H5695"\w* and the young \w lion|strong="H3715"\w* and the \w fatling|strong="H4806"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*; and a \w little|strong="H6996"\w* \w child|strong="H5288"\w* shall \w lead|strong="H5090"\w* them.

And the \w cow|strong="H6510"\w* and the \w bear|strong="H1677"\w* shall \w feed|strong="H7462"\w*; their young \w ones|strong="H3206"\w* shall lie \w down|strong="H7257"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*: and the \w lion|strong="H0738"\w* shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w straw|strong="H8401"\w* like the \w ox|strong="H1241"\w*.

And the sucking \w child|strong="H3243"\w* shall \w play|strong="H8173"\w* on the \w hole|strong="H2352"\w* of the \w asp|strong="H6620"\w*, and the weaned \w child|strong="H1580"\w* shall \w put|strong="H1911"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* on the \w cockatrice’|strong="H6848"\w* \w den|strong="H3975"\w*.\f + \fr 11.8 \ft cockatrice’: or, adder’s\f*

They shall not \w hurt|strong="H7489"\w* nor \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* in all my \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*: for the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* shall be \w full|strong="H4390"\w* of the \w knowledge|strong="H1844"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, as the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*.

¶ And in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* there shall be a \w root|strong="H8328"\w* of \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w*, which shall \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* for an \w ensign|strong="H5251"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; to it shall the \w Gentiles|strong="H1471"\w* \w seek|strong="H1875"\w*: and his \w rest|strong="H4496"\w* shall be \w glorious|strong="H3519"\w*.\f + \fr 11.10 \ft glorious: Heb. glory\f*

And it shall come to pass in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \add that\add* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* shall \w set|strong="H3254"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w again|strong="H3254"\w* the second \w time|strong="H8145"\w* to \w recover|strong="H7069"\w* the \w remnant|strong="H7605"\w* of his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, which shall be \w left|strong="H7604"\w*, from \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*, and from \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and from \w Pathros|strong="H6624"\w*, and from \w Cush|strong="H3568"\w*, and from \w Elam|strong="H5867"\w*, and from \w Shinar|strong="H8152"\w*, and from \w Hamath|strong="H2574"\w*, and from the \w islands|strong="H0339"\w* of the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*.

And he shall set \w up|strong="H5375"\w* an \w ensign|strong="H5251"\w* for the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, and shall \w assemble|strong="H0622"\w* the \w outcasts|strong="H1760"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and gather \w together|strong="H6908"\w* the \w dispersed|strong="H5310"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* from the \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w corners|strong="H3671"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.\f + \fr 11.12 \ft corners: Heb. wings\f*

The \w envy|strong="H7068"\w* also of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* shall \w depart|strong="H5493"\w*, and the \w adversaries|strong="H6887"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* shall be cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w*: \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* shall not \w envy|strong="H7065"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* shall not \w vex|strong="H6887"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*.

But they shall \w fly|strong="H5774"\w* upon the \w shoulders|strong="H3802"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* toward the \w west|strong="H3220"\w*; they shall \w spoil|strong="H0962"\w* \w them|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w east|strong="H6924"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*: they shall \w lay|strong="H4916"\w* their \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* upon \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w* and \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*; and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w* shall \w obey|strong="H4928"\w* them.\f + \fr 11.14 \ft them of: Heb. the children of\f*\f + \fr 11.14 \ft they shall lay…: Heb. Edom and Moab shall be the laying on of their hand\f*\f + \fr 11.14 \ft shall obey…: Heb. their obedience\f*

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall utterly \w destroy|strong="H2763"\w* the \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* of the \w Egyptian|strong="H4714"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*; and with his \w mighty|strong="H5868"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* shall he \w shake|strong="H5130"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* over the \w river|strong="H5104"\w*, and shall \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* it in the \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w streams|strong="H5158"\w*, and make \add men\add* go \w over|strong="H1869"\w* \w dryshod|strong="H5275"\w*.\f + \fr 11.15 \ft dryshod: Heb. in shoes\f*

And there shall be an \w highway|strong="H4546"\w* for the \w remnant|strong="H7605"\w* of his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* shall be \w left|strong="H7604"\w*, from \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*; like as it was to \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that he came \w up|strong="H5927"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.
